OutputChatConfirm.Title: Enable Output to Chat for All Conditions?
OutputChatConfirm.Content: Click 'Yes' to enable 'Output to Chat' on all Conditions

ConditionLab.NoReference: --No Reference Entry-- (Drag a Journal, Item, Actor, etc. into this field to set)
ConditionLab.SortAnchorTitle: Sort by Name - unsorted (click to change)
ConditionLab.SortAnchorTitle_asc: Sort by Name - A to Z (click to change)
ConditionLab.SortAnchorTitle_desc: Sort by Name - Z to A (click to change)

SortDirectionSave.Title: Save Mapping with Sort Direction?
SortDirectionSave.Content: Click 'Yes' to save the Condition Lab map with the current sort direction. Click 'No' to cancel Saving.

ConditionLab.BadReference: Could not build a link to the dropped content (actor, item, journal etc)

RestoreDefaultClearCache.CheckboxText: Clear cache and reload defaults from module folder?

MacroConfig.Heading: Macros to Execute
MacroConfig.Description: Select a macro to execute when this condition is added to or removed from a token/actor

TriggerConfig.Heading: Triggers
TriggerConfig.Description: Triggers that Apply or Remove this Condition

OptionConfig.Heading: Options

SpecialStatusEffects.Heading: Special Status Effects
SpecialStatusEffects.Description: Special Effects applied using native Foundry functionality.

BlindToken.Label: Blind Token
BlindToken.Notes: When applied, this Condition will also cause the token to be blinded

MarkInvisible.Label: Mark Invisible
MarkInvisible.Notes: When applied, this Condition will cause the affected Token to marked as Invisible

SpecialStatusEffectOverride.Title: Override Existing Condition for this Status Effect?
SpecialStatusEffectOverride.Content:
Another Condition ({existingCondition}) is already setup to apply this special Status Effect: {statusEffect}.

If you click 'Yes' and Save this Condition's Options you will override that existing mapping.

OptionConfig.SaveNote: Note: Clicking Save will Save Condition Lab Mapping

Warnings.ApplyCondition: applyCondition was replaced with addCondition. Please update your code.

CONCENTRATOR.NoMatchingCondition: No matching condition found for Concentrator. Please check your Concentrator and Condition Lab

Check.Title: Concentration Check
Check.ClosedByOther: Another user has rolled the concentration check

EnableEnhancedConditions.Title: Enable Enhanced Conditions?
EnableEnhancedConditions.Content:
In order to use Concentrator you must enable Enhanced Conditions.

Would you like to enable Enhanced Conditions

Messages.DoubleConcentration:
Concentrator

{entityName} cast {newSpellName} while concentrating on {oldSpellName}. Concentration on the original spell is lost.
Messages.ConcentrationTested:
Concentrator

{entityName} took damage and their concentration on {spellName} is being tested (DC{dc})!
Messages.Incapacitated:
Concentrator

{entityName} is incapacitated and concentration on {spellName} is lost!

CONCENTRATOR.AutoEndConcentrationH: Determines whether or not Concentration is automatically ended on a failed Concentration check.
CONCENTRATOR.NotifyConcentrationH: Send a message when a Concentration spell is cast.
CONCENTRATOR.NotifyConcentrationCheckH: Send a message when a Concentrating actor is forced to make a check.
CONCENTRATOR.NotifyEndH: Send a message when Concentration on a spell ends. (Including when the caster is incapacitated/dies)
CONCENTRATOR.HideNPCConcentrationH: Hide non-player-owned actor Concentration messages from players. This applies even if Concentration notifications are set to 'Everyone'

ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.MigrationVersionH: Version of CUB for which migration was last performed
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.ShowSortDirectionDialogN: Show Condition Lab Sort Direction Save Dialog
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.ShowSortDirectionDialogH: Whether or not to show the confirmation dialog for saving the sort direction.

MIGHTY_SUMMONER.PromptGMH: Specify whether GMs should receive the Mighty Summoner prompt when tokens are placed. Note: due to the way permissions work in Foundry, any actor with the feat will cause the GM to be prompted for every token dropped if this setting is checked.

GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.AwardXP: Provides an end of combat prompt to distribute XP from defeated hostile combatants.
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.Concentrator: Manages Concentration in the dnd5e game system.
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.EnhancedConditions: Provides the ability to map Conditions to Status Effect icons
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.HideNames: Replaces Actor names with a new name of your choice
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.PanSelect: Automatic panning and selection of tokens during combat
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.RerollInitiative: Rerolls Initiative on each Combat round change
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.TemporaryCombatants: Allows the creation of temporary combatants to track things like environmental or lair actions
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.Triggler: A trigger-management system for token/actor attribute changes
APPS.Wiki.Title: Combat Utility Belt Wiki
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.GameSystemNotSupport: CUB Enhanced Conditions does not work with this game system. Please check the CUB Wiki for more info
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.SimpleIconsNotSuppor: CUB Enhanced Conditions does not support game systems that use simple status effect icons.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.MapMismatch: This map does not match your game system and may not work as expected.

ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Title: Condition Lab
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ActiveEffects.Ti: Active Effect Config (Disabled - Save Mapping First)
Active Effect Config (Disabled - Cannot Edit Default Mapping)
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.LAB.Import.NoFile: You did not upload a data file!
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ConfirmDeleteCon: Are you sure you want to delete this row?
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.RestoreDefaultsC:
Are you sure you want to restore this mapping to defaults?

If you save, this change will be permanent.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ResetFormContent:
Are you sure you want to reset the form?

You will lose any unsaved changes.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.SaveFailed: Condition Lab failed to Save and Close
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.Title: Options:
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.RemoveOt: Remove other conditions when this one is applied
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.MarkDefe: Mark matching combatants defeated when this condition is applied
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.OutputCh: Output this condition to chat when added/removed
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.PreventativeSaveRemi: CUB - Enhanced Conditions | Preventative Save Reminder

To prevent some issues arising from the migration to Active Effects, please open the Condition Lab and click the Save Mapping button if you haven't already done so since CUB v1.3.0.

This will ensure your Condition Map is converted correctly.
GIVE_XP.DistributeForm.SelectFriendlies: Select which friendlies will receive XP.
GIVE_XP.DistributeForm.SelectHostiles: Select which hostiles will give XP.
HIDE_NAMES.ActorForm.EnableHint: Enable hiding of this actor's name in Combat Tracker and Chat Messages (overrides default)
HIDE_NAMES.ActorForm.ReplacementHint: The name to use instead of the Actor's name
HIDE_NAMES.ActorForm.DefaultSettingH: This is the current default setting for this token's disposition (set in CUBputer)
HIDE_NAMES.ActorSheetButton: Configure name hiding for this actor
CUB.TRIGGLER.App.AdvancedTrigger.Actor.N: Set the property path to use for Actor updates--the path is relative to the update object passed to the updateActor hook.
Optionally set a second property to compare the first one against--this path is relative to the Actor object itself
CUB.TRIGGLER.App.AdvancedTrigger.Token.N: Set the property path to use for Token updates--the path is relative to the update object passed to the updateToken hook.
Optionally set a second property to compare the first one against--this path is relative to the Token object itself
CUB.TRIGGLER.App.AdvancedTrigger.ActorPr: eg. data.attributes.hp.value (required if Token Update Property is not set)
CUB.TRIGGLER.App.AdvancedTrigger.TokenPr: eg. actorData.attributes.hp.value (required if Actor Update Property is not set)
CUB.TRIGGLER.App.AdvancedTrigger.Propert: The path to the updated property to listen for. The Actor and Token Entry Point values tell Triggler where to look for each entity type
CUB.TRIGGLER.App.Options.Title: Options
CUB.TRIGGLER.App.AdvancedTrigger.Operato: Always required. The operator and value apply to both Actor and Token Properties set above
CUB.TRIGGLER.App.AdvancedTrigger.Name.Wa: Name is required for advanced triggers!
SETTINGS.AboutApp.ButtonH: More info about Combat Utility Belt
SETTINGS.CUBPuter.ButtonH: Provides additional configuration for Combat Utility Belt
SETTINGS.Concentrator.EnableH: (Tested in D&D5e only)(Requires Enhanced Conditions) Forces concentration checks on tokens with the concentrating status effect when they take damage
SETTINGS.Concentrator.ConditionNameH: Name of the Condition to use for adding and checking for Concentration
SETTINGS.Concentrator.OutputToChatH: Display a message in chat whenever concentration is threatened
SETTINGS.Concentrator.PromptRollH: Prompt the player to make the check or not
SETTINGS.Concentrator.ConcentrationAttri: Concentration Attribute name as defined by game system
SETTINGS.Concentrator.HealthAttributeH: Health/HP attribute name as defined by game system
SETTINGS.Concentrator.AutoConcentrateH: When a Concentration spell is cast, automatically set the Concentrating status
SETTINGS.Concentrator.NotifyDoubleH: Send a message when a Concentration spell is cast while another spell is being Concentrated on
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.CoreIconsH: A copy of the core status icons
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.SystemH: A reference to the game system. Defaults to other if not known to the module
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.OutputCombat: On each round of Combat, output any conditions for the current combatant to chat
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.DefaultMapsH: Module-provided maps of conditions to icons
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.RemoveDefaul: Remove existing status effect icons from token HUD
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.MapTypeH: Condition map type currently in use -- default, custom or other
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.SuppressPrev: Suppress the reminder to save the Condition Lab to prevent issues (eg. if user has already done so)
SETTINGS.GiveXP.EnableH: Adds an option at the end of combat to automatically distribute xp from the combat to the players
SETTINGS.GiveXP.ModifierH: Multiplies awarded XP by this value
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableH: Hides Actor names in various places such as Combat Tracker and Chat
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableHostileH: Hide Names of Actors with Token Disposition set to HOSTILE
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableNeutralH: Hide Names of Actors with Token Disposition set to NEUTRAL
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableFriendlyH: Hide Names of Actors with Token Disposition set to FRIENDLY
SETTINGS.HideNames.HostileReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Hostile Actor names
SETTINGS.HideNames.NeutralReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Neutral Actor names
SETTINGS.HideNames.FriendlyReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Friendly Actor names
SETTINGS.HideNames.ReplacementStringH: Text to display for hidden names
SETTINGS.HideNames.HideFooterH: When names are hidden, also hide the chat card footer which can contain sensitive information
SETTINGS.HideNames.HidePartsH: If a hidden name includes spaces, breaks it into parts and hides all the parts
SETTINGS.MightySummoner.EnableH: (Tested in D&D5e only) Automatically check to see if token owner of NEUTRAL actor also owns an actor with the Mighty Summoner feat. Automatically calculates and adds new HP formula and rolls HP for token on canvas drop
SETTINGS.MightySummoner.FeatNameH: Name of the feat to check for
SETTINGS.PanSelect.EnablePanH: Enables the following token panning functionality
SETTINGS.PanSelect.PanGMH: Pans GM. Options: None (do not pan GM), NPC (pan only to non-player character tokens), All (pan to all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.PanPlayersH: Pans players. Options: None (do not pan players), Owner (pan only to Owned tokens), Observer (pan to Observed AND Owned tokens), All (pan to all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.EnableSelectH: Enables the following token select functionality
SETTINGS.PanSelect.SelectGMH: Selects token based on selected option: None (do not select), NPC (select only non-player character tokens), All (select all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.SelectPlayersH: Selects Player-owned tokens on their turn in combat
SETTINGS.PanSelect.ObserverDeselectH: Deselect controlled tokens on any non-Owned combatant's turn
SETTINGS.RerollInitiative.EnableH: Reroll initiative for each combatant every round
SETTINGS.RerollInitiative.RerollTempComb: Set whether to reroll initiative for Temporary Combatants if they are enabled
SETTINGS.TemporaryCombatants.EnableH: Allows the creation of temporary/freeform combatants from the Combat Tracker
SETTINGS.ActorUtility.InitiativeFromShee: Creates a clickable link on the Initiative heading in some Actor sheets
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.AutoRollHostileHpN: Enable Auto Roll Hostile Token HP
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.AutoRollHostileHpH: Automatically roll hp for hostile tokens on canvas drop
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.HideAutoRollH: If Hostile Token HP is automatically rolled, hide the roll from players
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.TokenEffectSizeH: Sets the size for token effect icons on the token. Numbers represent the amount of effect icons to show (X * Y). Default: Small - 5x5
